#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>

using namespace std;

#define gc getchar_unlocked
 
void scanint(int &x)
{
    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    int neg = 0;
    for(;((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-');c = gc());
    if(c=='-') {neg=1;c=gc();}
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
    if(neg) x=-x;
}

int main()
{
	int t,n,ans;
	scanint(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanint(n);
		ans = sqrt(n);
		printf("%d\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
